title: Skeleton (Tarn's Lair)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Skeletons are undead monsters that can be found inside Tarn's Lair and right outside it in the Abandoned Mine. These skeletons are unique in appearance and their item drops are unlike their regular counterparts.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Skeleton (Tarn's Lair)
This article is about the melee-using skeletons in Tarn's Lair. For the Magic-using skeletons in Tarn's Lair, see Skeleton (mage). For other skeletons, see Skeleton (disambiguation).
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Skeletons are undead monsters that can be found inside Tarn's Lair and right outside it in the Abandoned Mine. These skeletons are unique in appearance and their item drops are unlike their regular counterparts.
